entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -27.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 12:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -27.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 50 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -35.1°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
